drupalNodeEvent.title: The Chinese Dream and Ordinary Chinese People

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed:
Discussants:
Jason Furman, Aetna Professor of the Practice of Economic Policy, Harvard Kennedy School
Winnie Yip, Professor of the Practice of Global Health Policy, Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health; Acting Director, Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies

Moderator: Anthony Saich, Director, Ash Center for Democratic Governance and Innovation and Daewoo Professor of International Affairs, Harvard Kennedy School
